Less Is More Lyrics

Song by Darksoft from Grayscale · 2023
Less is more, close the door
I love the way the sunlight fades
A little bit can go a long way

There's beauty in minimalism
You don't need much to have enough
The best things come in small amounts

There's power in blank spaces
Enjoy the sound of empty thoughts
What you let in can hang around

Less is more
Less is more
